Verses: 1 varaiyaadugal Eenunkaalaththai Arivaayo? Maangal Kuttipodugiradhai Gavaniththaayo?
2 avaigal Sinaippattirundhu Varugira Maadhangalai Nee Enni, Avaigal Eenunkaalaththai Arivaayo?
3 avaigal Nondhu Kunindhu Thangal Kuttigalaip Pottu, Thangal Vedhanaigalai Neekkividum.
4 avaigalin Kuttigal Balaththu, Vanaththile Valarndhu, Avaigalandaikkuth Thirumba Varaamarpoividum.
5 kaattukkazhudhaiyaith Thannichchaiyaaith Thiriyavittavar Yaar? Andhak Kaattukkazhudhaiyin Kattugalai Avizhththavar Yaar?
6 adharku Naan Vanaandharaththai Veedaagavum, Uvarnilaththai Vaasasthalamaagavum Koduththen.
7 adhu Pattanaththin Iraichchalai Alatchiyampanni, Ottugiravanudaiya Kookkuralai Madhikkiradhillai.
8 adhu Malaigalile Than Meychchalaik Kandupidiththu, Sagalavidhap Pachchaippoondugalaiyum Thediththiriyum.
9 kaandaamirugam Unnidaththil Sevikka Sammadhikkumo? Adhu Un Munnanaikku Munbaaga Raaththangumo?
10 padaichchaalgalai Uzha Nee Kaandaamirugaththaik Kayirupottu Erile Poottuvaayo? Adhu Unakku Isaindhu Parambadikkumo?
11 adhu Adhiga Belamulladhendru Nee Nambi Adhinidaththil Velai Vaanguvaayo?
12 un Dhaaniyaththai Adhu Un Veettil Konduvandhu, Un Kalanjiyaththil Serkkum Endru Nee Adhai Nambuvaayo?
13 theekkuruvigal Thangal Settaigalai Asaivaatti Odugira Ottam, Naarai Than Settaigalaalum Iragugalaalum Parakkiradharku Samaanamallavo?
14 adhu Than Muttaigalaith Tharaiyile Ittu, Avaigalai Manalile Analuraikka Vaiththuvittuppoi,
15 kaalaal Midhipattu Udaindhupom Enbadhaiyum, Kaattumirugangal Avaigalai Midhiththuvidum Enbadhaiyum Ninaikkiradhillai.
16 adhu Than Kunjugal Thannudaiyadhallaadhadhupola Avaigalaik Kaakkaadha Kadinagunamulladhaayirukkum; Avaigalukkaaga Adharkuk Kavalaiyillaadhapadiyinaal Adhu Patta Varuththam Virudhaavaam.
17 dhevan Adharku Buththiyaik Kodaamal, Gnaanaththai Vilakkivaiththaar.
18 adhu Settai Viriththu Ezhumbumpodhu, Kudhiraiyaiyum Adhinmel Eriyirukkiravanaiyum Alatchiyampannum.
19 kudhiraikku Nee Veeriyaththaik Koduththaayo? Adhin Thondaiyil Kumuralai Vaiththaayo?
20 oru Vettukkiliyai Mirattugiradhupola Adhai Mirattuvaayo? Adhinudaiya Naasiyin Serukku Bayangaramaayirukkiradhu.
21 adhu Tharaiyile Thaaladiththu, Than Balaththil Kaliththu, Aayudhangalaith Thariththavarukku Edhiraagap Purappadum.
22 adhu Kalangaamalum, Pattayaththukkup Pinvaangaamalumirundhu, Bayappadudhalai Alatchiyampannum.
23 ambaraaththooniyum, Minnugira Eettiyum, Kedagamum Adhinmel Kalakalakkumpodhu,
24 garvamum Moorkkamunkondu Tharaiyai Vizhungividugiradhupol Anumaaniththu, Ekkaalaththin Thonikku Anjaamal Paayum.
25 ekkaalam Thonikkumpodhu Adhu Nigiyendru Kanaikkum; Yuththaththaiyum, Padaiththalaivarin Aarpparippaiyum, Senaigalin Aaravaaraththaiyum Dhooraththilirundhu Moppam Pidikkum.
26 un Buththiyinaale Raajaali Parandhu, Therkukku Edhiraagath Than Settaigalai Virikkiradho?
27 un Karpanaiyinaale Kazhugu Uyarap Parandhu, Uyaraththile Than Koottaik Kattumo?
28 adhu Kanmalaiyilum, Kanmalaiyin Sigaraththilum, Aranaana Sthalaththilum Thangi Vaasampannum.
29 angeyirundhu Iraiyai Nokkum; Adhin Kangal Dhooraththilirundhu Adhaip Paarkkum.
30 adhin Kunjugal Raththaththai Urinjum; Pinam Engeyo Ange Kazhugu Serum Endraar.
